alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clinton; Eastern Essex; Northern Franklin; Northern St. Lawrence; Southeastern St. Lawrence; Southern Franklin; Southwestern St. Lawrence; Western Clinton; Western Essex (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 26 at 6:37PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...AREAS OF PATCHY DENSE FOG OVERNIGHT... Dense fog has begun to develop in several places tonight, especially in the Connecticut River and Winooski River Valley but also across portions of Adirondacks. Not everyone will experience dense fog, but areas that do will have to the potential for the visibility to quickly drop to less than a quarter mile over short distances. Motorists should expect to encounter rapidly changing visibilities overnight, and should reduce speed and allow for extra braking distance when driving through dense fog patches. Use low beam headlights and take it slow when encountering fog.
